stimulusHtml:
Helvetii id quod constituerant facere conantur ut e finibus suis exeant. Ubi iam se
ad eam rem paratos esse arbitrati sunt, oppida sua omnia, numero ad duodecim, vicos
ad quadringentos, reliqua privata aedificia incendunt; frumentum omne, praeter quod
secum portaturi erant, comburunt, ut domum reditionis spe sublata paratiores ad omnia
pericula subeunda essent.

Bellum Gallicum 1.5

Answer the following questions in English unless the question specifically asks you to write out Latin words. Number your answer to each question.

1. (A) Translate in context id quod constituerant (line 1) and (B) identify the tense of constituerant.

2. To what does eam rem (line 1) refer?

3. According to line 2 (oppida . . . incendunt), how many of their towns did the Helvetii burn down?

4. According to lines 3-4 (ut . . . essent), why did the Helvetii destroy their homeland?

5. What construction is spe sublata (line 3) ?

6. In what part of a Roman town was frumentum (line 3) typically made available for purchase? Give the Latin name for that place.
